Report.Textbox63: Healthy Buildings International (formerly Healthy Buildings prior to 2015)

Details.EntityName1: Healthy Buildings International (formerly Healthy Buildings prior to 2015)
Details.Textbox24:
Healthy Buildings offers a collaborative approach to indoor air quality, commissioning, building specifications, technical assessments, full service lab analysis, Energy Star Rating and green buildings certifications such as LEED and Green Point Rated. This expertise and personal interest is a unique combination of business management, property maintenance efficiency, and green building solutions.
Our genuine principle in â€œmaking the business caseâ€ has grown Healthy Buildings into a national green buildings solutions company. Through our experience, Healthy Buildings has developed an offering that allows buildings to promote their corporate social responsibility in an economically profitable nature.
